headline: Adobe Firefly Storyteq Tie Up Highlights AI Potential And Valuation Gap
summary: Adobe (NasdaqGS:ADBE) is integrating its Firefly generative AI into ITG's Storyteq platform to automate content workflows for enterprises. The tie up combines Adobe Firefly with ITG's Halo Intelligence to support smarter content recommendations for marketing and customer engagement. This move expands Adobe's enterprise AI footprint by embedding its tools directly into a third party content automation platform. For Adobe, this partnership sits in the middle of its core business in creative...
